title: Recyclarr Settings
description: Optional settings to control the behavior of Recyclarr

repositories.title: Settings for any local git clones that Recyclarr manages

trash_guides.title: Settings for the Trash Guides GitHub repository

config_templates.title: Settings for the Recyclarr Config Templates GitHub repository

enable_ssl_certificate_validation.title: Allow SSL certificate validation for Sonarr & Radarr
enable_ssl_certificate_validation.description: If set to `false`, SSL certificates are not validated. This is useful if you are connecting to a Sonarr or Radarr instance using `https` and it is set up with self-signed certificates. Note that disabling this setting is a **security risk** and should be avoided unless you are absolutely sure what you are doing.

max_files.title: The maximum number of log files to keep
max_files.description: If there are more log files than the max allowed here, Log Janitor will remove the oldest log files.
